requirements.title: Dashboard Home
requirements.description: Create a main dashboard view at /analytics with customizable widgets and global filters.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard accessible at /analytics
Supports grid of customizable widgets
Widgets can be rearranged via drag-and-drop
Includes add/remove widgets button
Includes date range selector as a global filter
Includes auto-refresh toggle

ambiguity_flags.issue: 'load quickly' is not defined with specific performance metrics
ambiguity_flags.suggested_action: Define acceptable load time, e.g., 'Dashboard loads in under 2 seconds with up to 20 widgets'

requirements.title: Pre-built Widgets
requirements.description: Provide a set of pre-built widgets for data visualization.
acceptance_criteria: Includes Key Metrics widget with 4 configurable big numbers
Includes Line Chart for time series data
Includes Bar Chart for category comparison
Includes Pie Chart for distribution breakdown
Includes Data Table with sortable and filterable rows
Includes Funnel for conversion visualization

requirements.title: Custom Widget Builder
requirements.description: Allow users to create custom widgets with various configurations.
acceptance_criteria: Users can select data source (users, orders, events, etc.)
Users can choose visualization type
Users can configure dimensions and measures
Users can apply filters
Users can set refresh interval
Users can save widget with a custom name

requirements.title: Date Range Controls
requirements.description: Support flexible date selection for data filtering.
acceptance_criteria: Includes presets for Today, Yesterday, Last 7/30/90 days, This month, Last month
Includes custom range picker with calendar
Includes compare to previous period toggle
Date range can be applied to all widgets or a single widget

requirements.title: Export Capabilities
requirements.description: Allow users to export data and share dashboards.
acceptance_criteria: Users can export widget as PNG/PDF
Users can export underlying data as CSV/Excel
Users can schedule automated email reports (daily/weekly/monthly)
Users can share dashboard via link (read-only)

requirements.title: Real-time Updates
requirements.description: Ensure the dashboard reflects current data with real-time updates.
acceptance_criteria: WebSocket connection for live updates
Visual indicator when data refreshes
Configurable refresh intervals (1min, 5min, 15min, manual)

requirements.title: Access Control
requirements.description: Implement access control for dashboard and data security.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard-level permissions (view, edit, admin)
Data-level row security based on user role
Audit log of dashboard access

summary: Develop a self-service analytics dashboard for real-time data visualization and insights generation, reducing dependency on support for report requests.
